comment._content: Bonjour, je suis l'administrateur du groupe Donjons de France et d'Europe, et nous aimerions beaucoup que vous ajoutiez ceci à notre groupe !

comment.realname: Magda Not everybody trusts paintings but people believe photographs...
comment.author: 38934949@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called "Group of Unusual Photos" and we'd love to have this added to the group! You are Invited to Add your Ultra Unusual Photo in our Group of Unusual Photos , Group of unusual photos/ 3 per day/ENJOY :)
